title: Randia spinosa
Chemical Constituents: citric & tartaric acids; randianin â€“ sandianin; Randia Acid, ursosaponin, dumetoronins A,B,C,D,E&F; randoside A; Arachidic, Lignoceric, Linoleic, Oleic, Palmitic & stearic acids
